p.k: Emblem of the excellence and uniqueness of Italian opera, the community theatre of Modena is named in honour of Luciano Pavarotti, the greatest tenor of all time. Take a peek behind-the-scenes of the production of the opera Nabucco.
p.d: Emblem of the excellence and uniqueness of Italian opera, the community theatre of Modena is named in honour of Luciano Pavarotti, the greatest tenor of all time. It is in Modena that this pillar of opera began his extraordinary career, whose notable influence on the new generation of opera singers is evident in this behind-the-scenes sneak peek of the production of the opera Nabucco.
